link.title: Gloucester Township Public Schools: News and Announcements

div.p:
As a school district, we have been closely monitoring the news regarding the spread of the
coronavirus disease or COVID-19. Please follow the link for detailed information.

span.div: Although our school community has not had any suspected or confirmed cases, as a precautionary measure to prevent any potential exposure to COVID-19 among our school community, I have decided to close Gloucester Township Public Schools for two weeks, effective Tuesday, March 17, 2020.
Please click here​​​​​​​ for this notification in its entirety.

div.address: © Gloucester Township Public Schools • 17 Erial Road • Blackwood, NJ 08012 • Phone: (856) 227-1400
